question: Who has been appointed as the acting Chief Justice of Punjab & Haryana High Court, Chandigarh?
explanation: Justice AK Mittal has been appointed as the acting Chief Justice of Punjab & Haryana High Court, Chandigarh. Appointment of Justice Mittal, who is the first puisne Judge of the HC, has been notified by centre because of the retirement of CJ Vazifdar. Collegium had recommended the appointment of Justice Krishna Murari as the CJ of High Court but the Centre did not act on this recommendation.
